Xtremepicks Reports on SUTIMCo Inc (SUTI) - Getting back to

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on SUTIMCo Inc (SUTI)

If there’s one thing for sure the BUZZ around SUTI is crazy this weekend that will make for some wild and crazy action next week. But the true story here is the amazing potential of SUTI and their projects working closely with the top Technology Research Universities.

One of the project we find intriguing and currently driven by SUTI is company logo

The new generation AquaStar cooling system achieves an ultra-high efficiency 40-plus SEER (Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio) rating, has no CFCs or toxic gases, improves Indoor Air Quality and reduces AC electricity operating cost by up to 40 percent.

With more energy efficient minds, Environmental focus, and government incentive, this technology is becoming more and more a priority and a necessity. Reduction of electricity cost of up to 40% is reason enough for this company to get some serious notice. With the backing of Texas A&M University, and SUTI direction, this is no doubt a success to add value to SUTI’s bottom line. More details can be found at http://www.aquastarcooling.com/

This is just 1 of many projects underway lead buy SUTI and backed by top rated Universities. With this mindset and tapping into the new and innovative minds today, SUTI has a HUGE potential just as we have seen in another successful Company/University teamwork collaboration - Research in Motion (RIMM).

There is definitely monster value built up in this rarely explored area. RIMM was developed at Waterloo, Canada and has been a monster success generating over $20 Billion in sales per year - all from a University group with an idea. SUTI is that next group with a HUGE line up of potential portfolio of winners

SUTI is positioned perfectly with shares shifted into longer and stronger hands, and with HUGE potential from SUTI’s group of companies backed by over two dozen TOP Universities across the nation.

With a float and outstanding of 41 Million, there is no doubt that the 55 Million shares traded on SUTI last week and 77 million shares this month, that any and all added shares to the float have been eating up and have been shifted to long term and stronger hands - this paves the way now for a bullish run to MEGA gains.

And to re-iterate the potential of SUTI and our sights towards the $0.10 target level, if we look at our last 3 picks:

USEI – 134 Million float

AERS – 100 Million float

CMGO – 70 Million float

These plays gave members over 3,000% gains and all have HUGE potential – this definitely shows our persistence in conjunction with our members seeking long term goals with long term targets. With float of less than half then these plays, SUTI stands to gain large!

The collective here will push SUTI towards success and to where it should be

”Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.”

SUTI is a solid company with solid fundamental, and trading at $0.0105 is way undervalued and too good to pass up. This is why next week we will continue to buy shares from anyone looking for “Beer Money” and holding long term for monster gains.

SUTI

ABOUT SUTI

Select University Technologies, in.

“We will either find a way, or make one.”

The words of Carthaginian General Hannibal Barca are usually associated with his best-known military campaign. The quote, however, is not about Hannibal’s stunning victory. The quote is about the importance of strategy and tactics…about finding or making a way – a better way – to achieve success.

Hannibal was a gifted strategist, tactician and commander, and his place in history is about creating a new and better way. It is not so much the WHAT, but the HOW, that is Hannibal’s genius, reputation and legacy. And it is the HOW that is central to the SUTI story.

SUTIMCo Inc. is in the business of building businesses, and changing the paradigm of technology commercialization. The process inputs are PEOPLE, SYSTEMS, TECHNOLOGY and MONEY; and the outputs are the large liquidation event for each portfolio company.

What are Penny StocksPenny Stock Newsletter Why use them

Penny stocks are good investments. For a few bucks, one can possibly earn a good bundle of money. The key is to have a good understanding and know-how of such a investment. The tricks along with the ways are like the regular investments; but for a few exceptions. Certain additional things to get watched and explored. These are typically things which are not there for any big stocks, but very relevant for the Penny Stocks. The nature of Penny Stocks is different from that of the other stocks and investments. Could potentially be easily understood and identified through any Penny Commodity Newsletter. You can subscribe many of the Penny Stock Newsletters as these Penny Stock Newsletters are offered online too. They will send you the Cent Stock Alerts.

Your Penny Stock Alerts tell regarding the Stock Picks. In addition to the this, these Penny Stock Newsletters tell about the other related things; positive aspects, dangers and risks in Penny stock lists. Your Stock Picks are publicised by many newsletters. This is done for free as well as by charging money. A lot of these Penny Stock Alerts occur the daily bases and also weekly bases. But one has to subscribe for them. The subscription of some Alerts is for free, although others tell about Share Picks after charging profit. Paying and getting information makes it more reliable for some people, as things for free does not seem so accurate in this cyber world. But also for some other people, investing in Stock Picks can get burdensome.

One other aspect is this which some stock markets are great for such investments while others are certainly not good. They might be good for big stocks. Likewise most of the sources for stock picks may be trustworthy and others are probably not so. That is why people who are experts in Penny shares would not go to those marketplaces. The websites and newsletters also list companies who deal within micro cap. These lists may vary in accordance with the inclinations of the people giving out the lists. Some newsletters however may give a balanced and fair view. Stay away from the investments through phones. No one can be sure of precisely what is being told actually is accessible or not. Then there are pressures regarding the period of time. Under such pressures one may do an investment which will go nowhere. Making decisions below the pressure from some unknown person can really do a lot of harm.

Xtremepicks Reports on CCAJ, LUXR – Now this is a Xtreme W

Belize City, Belize, May 07, 2012 (PressReleasePoint) -- Publishers of daily newsletter xtremepicks (http://www.xtremepicks.com) looks at Coastal Capital Acquisition Corp (CCAJ) and Luxeyard (LUXR).

Coastal Capital Acquisition Corp (CCAJ) and Luxeyard (LUXR) have seen nothing but green since xtremepicks.com's alert last week, closing at all time highs for the week. CCAJ is making a breakout move up 26.66% last traded at $0.0076 and up solid from xtremepicks.com's $0.004 price alert yesterday. LUXR just made a new all-time high traded as high as $1.78 a 14% gain for the day!
COASTAL CAPITAL ACQUISITION CORP

Reverse Merger talk is on the mind of all investors with CCAJ with news right now, being leaked out. The targeted company, Earth Surfaces of America, Inc. is already selling their product in the Home Depot stores, not an easy feat to do with one of the biggest hardware store. The crazy thing is that CCAJ is making a breakout move, and the company has yet to release the official press release. But, what the company has done already is made the management changes as indicated in their corporate filings, and they have updated their profile on otcmarkets.com. CCAJ business description on OTCmarkets.com http://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/CCAJ/company-info

Coastal Capital acquired 100% of Earth Surfaces of America, Inc. on April 30, 2012. Earth Surfaces is now a wholly owned subsidiary.

Earth Surfaces manufactures high end paver products and polished concrete solid surfaces and flooring products. Earth Surfaces in the past four years has been developing eco-friendly Terrazzo concrete products, utilizing the industry’s best methods to produce the ultimate and most cost effective products eco-friendly, re-cycled products.

Earth Surfaces has utilized the talent from previous manufacturing of taking raw stone and producing the ultimate in marble products. Earth Surfaces has developed a full line of custom pavers in multiple sizes, shapes, thickness, finishes, and contents and has supplied several high profile projects: City of Hollywood, Collins Park, Naples Beach Hotel, Seagate Hotel, Ocean’s II Condos, Fort Myers International Airport, Nassau Bahamas Airport, etc.

CCAJ is making a play into penny land and HUGE momentum is building. Last traded at $0.0075, CCAJ is up 26.66% and close to a double return from xtremepicks alert last week.

ABOUT COASTAL CAPITAL ACQUISITION CORP.

Coastal Capital Acquisition Corp is in the midst of a reverse merger recently announced and updated through otcmarkets.com Identifying and acquisition of 100% of Earth Surfaces of America, Inc. on April 30, 2012. Earth Surfaces is now a wholly owned subsidiary.

LUXR just hit a fresh new high of $1.78 a 14% gain. Investors are catching on tolast weeks news and realizing that LUXR is hitting all the right markets. LUXR is a unique and trend making company shifting from traditional Retail to “Flash Sales”. With already 425,000 members, LUXR is right on target to reach 1 Million by the end of Q2, 2012. Now, with “one of a kind” and limited “fine art” added to their product list, this is attracting more members and significant $$ to the bottom line.

LuxeYard Adds Works Of Art To Its Growing List Of Flash Sale Categories

LuxeYard Inc., (OTCBB: LUXR), the fast-growing boutique luxury flash sale site, is expanding its ecommerce offerings to include one-of-a-kind and limited editions of fine art, photography and sculpture from collections worldwide. In addition to curating collections through its relationships with well-known galleries and artists, LuxeYard has issued a call for artists to submit photos of their pieces via its newly enhanced Concierge Buying platform. The LuxeYard community will then serve as curators, suggesting which artists should be featured on the site by way of the pieces they “like,” “follow” and comment upon. LuxeYard members can also upload photos of the pieces they want its art buying team to source. Currently featured on the site at www.LuxeYard.com are three popular California artists, including photographers Kelly Fitzgerald and Emily Goodman, and abstract painter Michelle Oppenheimer. Limited editions will also be available with certificates of authenticity. “A perfect complement to our home furnishings, we are bringing a tasteful, curated approach to buying art online,” said Braden Richter, CEO of LuxeYard. “Art collectors, interior designers and consumers alike will appreciate the unique pieces and the confidence of knowing we are providing them with authentic, high-quality pieces at rates below what they would find in galleries or other retail outlets.” Fine art consultant Dustin Rourke, founder of the Home Arts Collection, is advising LuxeYard and will present artists he represents, including Sunday B. Morning prints made from screens originally created by Andy Warhol. Other artists will debut later this month, including painter Francesca Quintano, known for her distinctive oil paintings. Galleries already slated to be featured on LuxeYard in the coming weeks include The Photographer’s Gallery and Room Service, a Los Angeles boutique furniture showroom where anyone can have photos they submit turned into Andy Warhol-like pop art portraits.

About LuxeYard
LuxeYard is a members-only flash sale site for luxury home furnishings, decor and fashion that offers access to unique products sourced by a seasoned team of buyers at a fraction of retail prices. LuxeYard is the pioneer of Concierge Buying, which gives members the power to determine what items will be sold on the site, and Group Buy which allows them to lower the price by sharing sale items with friends. Along with its veteran retail, e-commerce and digital marketing management team, LuxeYard partners with celebrity Trendsetters and design and fashion industry insiders to deliver a curated buying experience from a unique point of view to its members. To join the LuxeYard community, visit www.LuxeYard.com.

ABOUT ORYON

Oryon Technologies, Inc. (OTCQB: ORYN) is a developer of next-generation electroluminescent (“EL”) lighting technology. Oryon’s patented technology trademarked ELastoLite®, enables thin, flexible, crushable, water resistant lighting systems to be incorporated into new and far-reaching product applications across multiple markets. The Company believes ELastolite® is a disruptive technology that will open up new markets and enable the creation of new products which would otherwise be unavailable without ELastoLite®technologies.

Xtremepicks reports on CMG Holdings (CMGO) – Not just a on

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on CMG Holdings Inc (CMGO)

We have been talking a lot about the HUGE spinoff of AudioEye which adds significant value for shareholders in itself, but what is especially special about CMGO, is that they also have several other subsidiaries making tons of money with revenues increasing 45% year over year!

Logo

CMGO’s revenues from subsidiaries increased over 45% year over year!

http://www.xtremepicks.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/CMGO.gif

CMGO also is a conglomerate of other large revenue generating subsidiaries. In fact, revenues increase over 45% year over year with $7.2 Million in sales for the 2011 year and expect this to increase over $10 Million in 2012.

With the spin off of “Audio Eye” expected by the end of the month, CMGO will be adding significant overall value to its shareholders.

CMGO is at Rock Bottom Prices with 500% – 1,000% potential gains

One specific subsidiary getting special attention is their XA subsidiary
XA, The Experiential Agency, Inc. (“XA”) - Check out their Facebook page for some recent events

XA, The Experiential Agency, Inc. (XA) is CMG’s wholly owned subsidiary engaged in event marketing and management. Acquired in 2009, XA engages in a diverse range of marketing services, including interactive event strategy and planning, creative development, public relations, and nontraditional marketing. XA has staged movie and show premiers, cross country tours, hosted VIP events, staged press stunts, and other types of media events and services for leading shows, production houses, non-profit agencies and local communities across the United States. In addition to the physical planning, logistics and event implementation, XA typically takes over responsibility for the interactive side of the events to increase branding awareness over the Internet.

XA contributed a significant portion of total revenues ($7.2 Million in 2011) for CMGO with solid growth rates making both CMGO parent company and new spinoff shares of AudioEye quite valuable.

CMGO showed super strength yesterday after a minor dip that gave us a prime opportunity to load up at super cheap levels. We will be on the look out again to take the advantage, but if it's anything like yesterday this opportunity will get snapped up in a hurry if any.

With prices targets set by Direct Global Media's who brought DROP from sub-pennies ($0.0015) to dollar land ($1.25), CMGO is well on track for solid 1,000%+ gains

About CMG Holdings Group, Inc. (CMGO):

CMG Holdings Group, Inc. is a full service marketing and communications holding company. CMGO's mission is to build a national platform of exceptional companies that deliver solutions in the areas of alternative advertising, social media marketing services, event management and commercial rights. CMGO is seeking to expand its national presence via its acquired companies, capitalizing on their intellectual properties, patents, sales and marketing, new product development and continued operations via economic recovery. CMGO owns and operates wholly-owned subsidiaries, XA, The Experiential Agency, Inc. and Audio Eye, Inc.

For more information, please visit: www.cmgholdingsinc.com

Xtremepicks Reports on US Energy (USEI) – Mad Dash to buy

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on U.S. Energy Initiatives Corp. (USEI)

Ticker: USEI
Last Close: $0.326

USEI busted out of the gates early and never looked back shattering several new records including all-time high price, biggest $ and total volume traded, and best performer stock 3 days straight!

USEI is an easy $0.10+ stock and with the coverage of Direct Global Media reaching out to North America and overseas Europe, this is definitely getting a ton of exposure and it showed it today.

Special Alert: Direct Global Media Initiates Coverage on US Energy Initiatives Corp (USEI)

US Energy

USEI is in “Blue Sky” territory with ZERO Dilution, breaking through all resistance levels, and solid management focus – The Bulls are in control and there no letting up on how high this can go.

USEI wicked session ended the day at $0.0326 up 77% on monster volumes of 22 Million shares traded. We are on HIGH alert for monster updates from the company this week.

http://charts.stockscores.com/chart.asp?TickerSymbol=USEI&TimeRange=365&Interval=d&Volume=1&ChartType=CandleStick&Stockscores=1&ChartWidth=830&ChartHeight=500&LogScale=None&Band=None&avgType1=SMA&movAvg1=20&avgType2=SMA&movAvg2=50&Indicator1=None&Indicator2=None&Indicator3=None&Indicator4=None&endDate=2012-06-7&CompareWith=

About US Energy Initiatives

The Company has two separate energy initiatives; one in the automotive sector and one in the oil, gas & technology sector.

We will continue to develop and market our automotive technologies which we have done since 1996; and focus on manufacturing and marketing GREEN retrofit systems for the conversion of gasoline and diesel engines, stationary or vehicular, to non-petroleum-based fuels, such as compressed natural gas and liquefied natural gas.

We will also acquire and develop stranded or un-recovered oil properties for enhanced oil production, create partnerships with operators, create strategic alliances for primary and secondary recovery, and partner with farm-ins on properties where technology will be utilized to improve recovery efforts. Our goal here is to become an environmentally responsible oil and gas company; utilizing all methods available to improve oil recovery.

Xtremepicks Reports on US Energy (USEI) – Supercharged for

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on U.S. Energy Initiatives Corp. (USEI)

Ticker: USEI
Last Close: $0.35

USEI is revving up big time heading into the weekend, expect a major push to close out a MONSTER week. This weekend, Direct Global Media will be releasing their Research Report on USEI that investors don’t want to miss!

The key to USEI and monster gains is not only there’s ZERO dilution, or worldwide exposure of this unique opportunity…USEI has a product that is in a class of its own – higher quality at much cheaper prices than anyone else out there.

US Energy Initiatives announces the launch of the SINGULAR 96 brand. (PRNewsFoto/US Energy Initiatives Corp)

So, what does 96 Octane fuel mean for you and your car? When looking at even 94 Octane gas which is current standard premium, this performance and higher detergency helps to:

Clean your car’s fuel injectors and intake valves — and keep them clean
Optimize fuel economy
Reduce emissions
Improve overall vehicle performance year-round

94 higher octane helps ensure you get maximum horsepower, acceleration and performance from your vehicle, even under tough driving conditions.

Now, imagine what USEI’s Singular 96™ can do to improve further your car’s performance?

Even better, USEI’s product cost much less than even the lowest grade 87 Octane level fuel! It’s a no brainer!

This 96 Octane fuel is a Premium Grade product, competitively priced below the local prevailing price for Regular Grade 87 Octane gasoline.

From PR Newswire (share this quote)

USEI also just announce that their Singular 96™ will be hitting the US and Global markets with revenues within weeks, rarely heard of with a reverse merger company to be on the ground running hard so quickly!

US Energy

Many people were left on the sidelines watching DROP gain as much as 83,000% and never taking the opportunity when minor dips presented themselves.

Those who did made HUGE gains, those who did not continue to kick themselves. But, here’s another opportunity with USEI ready for a “DROP like” breakout.

Xtremepicks Reports on Aerius - AERS – This just in from a

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on Aerius International, Inc. (USEI)

Ticker: AERS
Last Close: $0.0265

AERS response was over the top this weekend when we hit our European base making for this week a must watch for monster gains. With Friday’s bullish run towards close, this no doubt will be a Monster Monday.

Not only the buzz is insane, we are getting ready for AERS to release a monster update this week following their recent upgrade to current on the otcmarkets, and filling all financials to become fully reporting.

We are definitely on high news watch this week and expect to get news relating to one of the major phone carriers including T-Mobile and Vodafone who are definitely interested in AERS Patented technology.

Grass Roots Research may just be on to something when they issued a research report and price target of $0.59. They know if AERS hooks up with one or both of these major phone carriers this is a HUGE step for the company. And, for Grass roots to issue a $0.59 price target definitely gives an indication that they may know that this is already a done deal.

Aerius International, Inc. (AERS) announced today that Grass Roots Research and Distribution, Inc. Investment Overview of Aerius has a per share Cohen Index price target for Aerius of $0.59 … more

This partnership with T-Mobile and Vodafone is the key next step following their US patent which was recent awarded on their smart phone technology

Aerius Awarded US PatentMarketwire(Wed, Feb 22)

AERS closed Friday with HUGE bullish momentum at $0.0265 up 10.87% adding to our monster gains from our initial alert at $0.003 – that’s a 800% gainer and with our European base humming and buzzing big time, we are in for a wild and crazy week you don’t want to miss.

AERS logo

About Aerius International, Inc

Aerius smart phones prove to almost eliminate SAR and as much as 97% below US and EU SAR limit!

SAR is the specific absorption rate of microwave radiation from cell phone handsets into human tissue – a leading cause of brain cancer from cell phone as reported World Health Organization (WHO).

It’s gets even better, not only AERS‘ phone will be considers No SAR phones, it also extends battery life 2-4 hours longer, and double their range compared to other smart phone sold worldwide!

AERS just recently filed all necessary documents and was upgraded to current on otcmarket – a definite sign that the company is ready to unleash a series of updates that will get the attention of MAJOR carriers. Trading at well below proper valuations, investors stand to make a mint.

Aerius International, Inc. has developed a revolutionary antenna technology for cell phones proven by carriers and in independent labs to increase battery life 66% and reduce handset power loss into users 99.4%.

Aerius won the Frost and Sullivan 2009 North American Wireless Technologies Green Excellence of the Year Award, based on Aerius equipped phone performance.

Xtremepicks Reports on AERS, CMGO – How we get to our pric

Xtremepicks.com publishers of FREE penny stock newsletters and alerts reports on Aerius International, Inc (AERS) and CMG Holdings (CMGO)

CMGO released news today with Wall Street Resources Inc initiating price targets between $0.11 to $0.26 which also confirms Direct Global Media’s (DGM) near and long term prices targets!

Grass Roots Research initiated their target on AERS with a mind blowing $0.59 per share.

Add these two projections together spell mega gains for long term holders, but how do we reached these price targets?

Logo

CMGO is a no brainer with the AudioEye spinoff moments away – but members need to be holders of CMGO by the dividend closing date to get it. Selling before this will lose one of the more valuable piece of the company.

Investors don’t have to look too far to see the potential here for CMGO, in fact sister company Augme inc (AUGT) traded as high as $4.32 per share and has many similarities with AudioEye.

A $4 dollar share price of newly formed AudioEye translates into an intrinsic value of about $0.05 per CMGO share. Not to mention, CMGO’s other subsidiaries that contributes significant revenues with solid growth rates year over year.

Additionally, aside from playing in the same field with the same expertise, both companies have significant patents on their technology which many others are infringing on. This is key since Bradley in an expert in patent infringement and will add significant value to AudioEye’s position.

AERS logo

We are about to be unveiled a MAJOR update from AERS by the company. With recent completion of all filing and uplisting on the otcmarkets, is just a matter of time the company unleashes a series of updates, it’s not a question of if, but when – and the time is very near.

We have also just received very interesting information from the company and feel this should be distributed to our members immediately – Taken from a recent company sales presentation, it shows the potential of AERS and definitely give support for a price target of $0.59 initiated by Grass Roots Research.

http://www.xtremepicks.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/img2.gif

These are some SOLID figures AERS has put together and we anticipate news to follow up on these metrics. With project sales in the millions within the first year definitely gives solid support to Grass Roots price target of $0.59.

The potential on CMGO and AERS is HUGE and the true value in in the product, with prices a well below targets, member stand to gain big time!

About Aerius International

Aerius International, Inc. has developed a revolutionary antenna technology for cell phones proven by carriers and in independent labs to increase battery life 66% and reduce handset power loss into users 99.4%.

Aerius won the Frost and Sullivan 2009 North American Wireless Technologies Green Excellence of the Year Award, based on Aerius equipped phone performance.

About CMG Holdings Group, Inc. (CMGO):

CMG Holdings Group, Inc. is a full service marketing and communications holding company. CMGO’s mission is to build a national platform of exceptional companies that deliver solutions in the areas of alternative advertising, social media marketing services, event management and commercial rights. CMGO is seeking to expand its national presence via its acquired companies, capitalizing on their intellectual properties, patents, sales and marketing, new product development and continued operations via economic recovery. CMGO owns and operates wholly-owned subsidiaries, XA, The Experiential Agency, Inc. and Audio Eye, Inc.

For more information, please visit: www.cmgholdingsinc.com
